name: DiagnosisRole
description: SAP codeSystem for the role of a diagnosis in Encounter and Account instances. It complements the FHIR codeSystem for diagnosis role

concept.definition: Principle DRG diagnosis, taken into account for DRG grouping in this role
Secondary DRG diagnosis, taken into account for DRG grouping in this role
The referral diagnosis for outpatients or referral diagnosis for inpatients is the diagnosis which is noted on referral documents presented by the patient.
A treatment diagnosis can be further specialized as surgery diagnosis, admission diagnosis etc.
The surgery diagnosis is a diagnosis that is directly linked to a peformed surgical procedure
The department main diagnosis is the diagnosis which is the reason for outpatient or inpatient treatment during a department stay
The hospital main diagnosis is the diagnosis which is the reason for outpatient or inpatient treatments during a hospital stay.
